headline: Haliburton (HAL) Jumps 11.6% on Upbeat International Outlook
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Leaving Wall Street in the Dust. Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL) is one of the best performers on Tuesday. Halliburton extended its winning streak to a third consecutive day on Tuesday, jumping 11.58 percent to end at $25.24 apiece, as investors cheered its optimistic outlook from international oilfields in the fourth quarter […]

headline: Halliburton Beats on Q3 Earnings, Trims 2026 Capex Plan
summary: HAL posts stronger-than-expected Q3 results on cost cuts, trims its 2026 capital plan by 30% amid softer North American demand.

headline: 100 Charities Nationwide Receive Funds Raised Through the Halliburton Charity Golf Tournament
summary: HOUSTON, October 22, 2025--The Halliburton Charitable Foundation raised more than $3.8 million through the annual Halliburton Charity Golf Tournament, which takes place at The Clubs of Kingwood. This year, the funds will support the missions of 100 nonprofit organizations that serve the community through educational, workforce development, health and safety, and social services programs. Since 1993, the event has raised $35 million in support of more than 250 charities.

headline: S&P 500 Futures Steady as Rate Cut Debate Builds
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Wednesday, Oct, 22 2025 US equity futures are leaning mixed this morning as investors dissect falling Treasury yields and shifting expectations for a Federal Reserve rate cut. The focus is squarely on upcoming inflation data and signals from global central banks. Hopes for a cooling economy drive debate over whether lower rates will spur fresh optimism or simply reflect deeper uncertainty, leaving consumer-focused shares especially worth watching as...

headline: Halliburton (HAL): Valuation in Focus After Expansion Into Low-Emission Data Center Power
summary: Halliburton, a leader in energy services, is making headlines after announcing a partnership with VoltaGrid to deliver efficient, lower-emission power solutions for data centers in the Middle East. This move signals a step beyond oilfield services. See our latest analysis for Halliburton. Recent months have seen Halliburton push further into digital and sustainable energy, with new contracts in Brazil and a breakthrough in subsea operations, all while expanding into lower-emission data center...

headline: Halliburton stock price swings after Q3 earnings
summary: Halliburton shares jumped 11.6% on Tuesday after the Houston-based oil service company reported its Q3 revenue of $5.6 billion, surpassing Wall Street’s estimate of $5.39 billion. The company reported adjusted net income of $0.58 per share (diluted), with an adjusted margin of 13%, reflecting ...
